SELECT A.detailId,A.sessionId,C.serial_no as transOrderId,A.transId,A.propName,A.oldValue ,A.newValue,A.createUserId,B.FHumanName as createPerson ,A.createDateTime FROM orderSessionDetail A LEFT JOIN tsysuser B ON A.createUserId=B.FUserName LEFT JOIN crm_work_order C ON A.transId=C.id WHERE A.transId= #{transId} AND A.sessionId= #{sessionId}
ORDER BY A.createDateTime ASC
